document_data.caption2: A map of the Duckrace stream in Shadowdale.
document_data.name: Duckrace
document_data.mainbody: The '''Duckrace''' was a creek in the town of [[Shadowdale (town)|Shadowdale]].
document_data.Geography: The stream was located just south of the village of Shadowdale, it ran north to south and emptied into the [[Millpond]].
